Reviews.Title: Another Casio winner
Reviews.Author: D. Foss "debnh"
Reviews.Content: First let me say, I was scared to death to purchase a camera in Japanese language setting and not be able to switch it to English.  BUT it was so easy to find the setting.  Literally took me 3 seconds to figure it out and I'm not that tech savvy!  Don't be deterred by this, you can do it. I used the CASIO website, opened up the manual and read up on it before purchasing.  So glad I did.This is my 2nd CASIO Exilim.  Previous model was the EX-S10 that I've owned for about 5 years and traveled the world with it; literally.  However my favorite camera lacked nighttime photo quality, as many point & shoots do.  It was time to update and so I began debating the top notch name-brand cameras on the market such as Nikon, Cannon and Sony. Sadly I was not impressed with their speed and functionality. I found myself going back to CASIO.The CASIO EX-ZR1000 is everything in one neat little package!  It's quick, turn the power button on and it's ready within seconds to take a shot.  There is panoramic built into the camera, no need to "attach" photos when you upload them onto your computer. The HDR and ART photos so far have been amazing; and fun! Premium Auto Pro function is great for when I'm being lazy and don't want to fuss with adjustments and still get great shots. Also has Best Shot which makes colors pop. The ZR1000 feels solid in your hands, not plastic and flimsy.  Flash works great, not overbearing and blinding but bright enough.  There are advanced settings for more advanced users and simple settings for those of us who just want a good shot every time!

Reviews.Title: Very fast, quality pictures!
Reviews.Author: bigstudio
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted, the camera was as fast as advertised [30 still frames per second], many higher end features [raw image capture, many manual features, HDR, focus ring, 1080p video, etc.]. If you want a super-fast camera that takes quality 16mp pictures, you may want this camera.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera
Reviews.Author: X
Reviews.Content: Beautiful camera and great for taking self portraits. It is very easy to use and this definitely won't disappoint you!

Reviews.Title: Casio best kept secret
Reviews.Author: philip king
Reviews.Content: I searched for this cam on the recommendation of a Photog friend of mine. Like me ,also a Photog. , I have grown tired of luggiing the "heavieyes)s" around, 1D's and 5D's with the glass.So looking for a quality alternative ,I took a look. I was impressed so I ordered one and havent looked back since. The camera is way more than I expected in still and video possibilities. Too many features to list here and I keep finding more.Its not to replace the DSLR, Just to have a pocket cam that will do everything I need it to do in a very quick pinch.Excellent resolution Very reachable 300mm digi zoom ( yes) to a 14mm uber wide aspect.With lots more tricks in between.I would buy this camera again and I do recommend you do too, at least give it some consideration. The price is right, only thing : this camera is not available in stores in the U.S.. It comes with Japanese instructions and starts in the same language. English is available online.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Yuzhen Zhang
Reviews.Content: Althougt the flash is not as well as TR but its still very good and valuable, try to use it in a light place.

Reviews.Title: Excellent social camera. Not for photo snobs.
Reviews.Author: tomahagne "..."
Reviews.Content: The BEST thing about this camera is the swiveling view-screen for self-portraits. It may seem trivial at first until you use it. My wife and I used this to take photos of ourselves in front of landmarks and on hiking trails in Puerto Rico where there's sometimes no one around to take your photo, or when everyone's so busy taking their own photos, they can't be bothered. And let's not forget the language barrier. The lens is wide enough to capture a fair bit of background at arm's length. The hands-free trigger is genius. The screen swings both ways so you can tilt it up to take really low shots from the ground and you can tilt it down to shoot downwards at arm's length.The SECOND best thing about this camera is the Best Shot. It captures several images in a short burst and pieces the best elements together. This ensures excellent exposure at multiple distances. And it's pretty seamless. There're hardly any artifacts for something that's so processed. It's nearly impossible to take a poor photo!Those 2 alone make this camera worth every penny.We also appreciated the light weight, attractive appearance, big optical zoom, large swiveling view screen, and decent ergonomics. We haven't really delved into the other neat features like high-speed video and various Art Shots.I will call the images "pretty good". They're more than enough for 4"x6" vacation photos, but you won't be submitting them to any photography magazines or blowing them up too big.I think this is perfectly suited for social photographers that enjoy lots of pictures of their friends and/or with friends in front of landmarks and monuments or at dark parties/restaurants. It's not really catered towards artsy photographers.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: he cong
Reviews.Content: Love everything about this camera, only down side is it is kinda hard to take picture when you flip the screen up.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Peter P
Reviews.Content: Amazing camera with great functions and the price is right, much cheaper than if I were to buy locally. Can't complain, bought it for the slo-mo function, works as it should, just remember to film in bright light to prevent grainy dark videos. Also, indoor lights and screens will flicker in highspeed videos, so you may want to invest in studio lights or something like that if you are into taking slo-mo videos. Shoots fast for normal use, battery last for quite a while, you may want to get extra batteries if you are using it for long outdoor activities though. I have 4 batteries and I went on a tour for a day, was up to my last battery at the 10-hour point when the day ended, safe to say that I wouldn't run out for 12 hours+ with 4 batts. Absolutely love it, using my phone for taking photos lesser and lesser, LOL

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: yingpan
Reviews.Content: This camera take a picture very beauty I like it！ems is ok no quick no slow~Good camera like appearance

Reviews.Title: awesome!

Reviews.Content: it's really a good camera have so many function, its much greater than casio TR serises. you will like it!

Reviews.Title: Good job
Reviews.Author: Emma Li
Reviews.Content: Nice shoot and amazing result. Light weigh, nice color, easy to control, and the price is worth. Buy it and you will not regret.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Jia LIU
Reviews.Content: Super many different mode and pretty good with night view. The selfie function is just so convenient! Just the recording video button is too close to the taking photo one. It is easy to make a mistake and after two weeks the delete photo function broke. I have to delete photo from my laptop now.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Vicky
Reviews.Content: great camera! I like the white color, but it's a little bit heavy for me tho. The camera has alot of different function

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: Carmen
Reviews.Content: super good camera for the price of it. it has so many different functions and the picture quality is just great. it is comparable to a dslr. you can choose to use the camera as manual just like you do with a dslr. one of the main reason i got this camera is for the beauty function that it has. it works great! it smooths the skin out and makes you look flawless. another reason i got it is for the build-in stand that it has. it is great for couples because you can easily set it down and take pictures without going through the trouble of asking someone to take the picture of you. or even take a "selfie" yourself at different angles to get different effects. would definitely recommended it for anyone looking for a good quality camera.

Reviews.Title: My GF loves it
Reviews.Author: Junge Tian
Reviews.Content: Good gift. my gf use it to take picture every daythanks one two three four five six seven eight

Reviews.Title: nice

Reviews.Content: NICE camera , I really enjoy it and have a lots of fun time with it, anyway  its worth it,

Reviews.Title: wrong color but excellent camera

Reviews.Content: Although they sent me the wrong color, I like this camera so much! I will try to like the red one, cuz I don't want to wait another 2 days to get a new one....

Reviews.Title: Not awesome but good

Reviews.Content: It does its job as its price offered. The function and quality just as described, I got a white one and I DONT THINK it looks like a toy, it's cute and girly. The beauty skin function somehow doesnt work really well and its pretty big and so heavy.

Reviews.Content: I love it, it is nice and i like the color of white.it is very useful. and the cramer is new.

Reviews.Content: I use to own a Tr-100 and i sold it to get this,Tr series is good for taking self picture but using to take landscape and all , is just badthis camera is cute, a little bit than i expected but has a good gripit takes great selfies like the TR series as long as you know to to set itand taking other picture is great ,the camera look is so adorable , it loooks so professional when i hang it on my neck with the string tie,is just attracting when i use it in public~

Reviews.Title: Great product!!

Reviews.Content: Really love this camera!Great product with lower price~ It is not worth any penny to buy the Casio TR series. This one is perfect. Love this seller, fast shipping speed and get it really fast from Japan. Plus their fastest shipping rate is similar to other's regular shipping rate. What a great deal~~ Will recommend to friends later~
